title: Forever Rich
description: This is the story of Richie and his journey to become the greatest rap-artist in the Netherlands. One evening he is violently mugged by a group of teenagers and loses his most prized possession: an expensive watch. When images of the humiliating robbery go viral, Richie's hard-earned reputation is damaged.

reviews.text: There's a poignant irony in this film, because while I suppose it will be complicated for several viewers to connect with its subject matter, its approach is constructed with the intention of making you care about someone who's simply an insignificant individual, yet everything around him revolves around the people putting attention to his actions.And pretending to care about such a banal and empty story is practically impossible when the effort is so shallow and frivolous.
lamentable, triste, penoso, deplorable, lastimoso, doloroso, luctuoso, sensible, miserable
